TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XslCompiledTransform extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 XSLT 樣式表轉換 XML 資料。

span.span: Transforms XML data using an XSLT style sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是支援 XSLT 1.0 語法的 XSLT 處理器。The class is an XSLT processor that supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. 它是新的實作，並包含的效能提升相較於過時類別。It is a new implementation and includes performance gains when compared to the obsolete class. 結構類別是非常類似於類別。The structure of the class is very similar to the class. 方法載入並編譯樣式表，同時方法執行 XSLT 轉換。The method loads and compiles the style sheet, while the method executes the XSLT transform. Xslt 支援`document()`函式和內嵌指令碼區塊預設會停用。Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks are disabled by default. 可以啟用這些功能，藉由建立物件，並將其傳遞至方法。These features can be enabled by creating an object and passing it to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)並[從 XslTransform 類別移轉](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). ## 安全性考量Security Considerations 建立使用 類別的應用程式時，您應留意下列項目及其含意：When creating an application that uses the class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - 依預設會停用 XSLT 指令碼。XSLT scripting is disabled by default. 僅當需要指令碼支援且在完全受信任的環境中運作時，才應啟用 XSLT 指令碼。XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment. - 依預設會停用 XSLT `document()` 函式。The XSLT `document()` function is disabled by default. 如果您啟用 `document()` 函式，則藉由傳遞 物件至 方法，限制可存取的資源。If you enable the `document()` function, restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an object to the method. - 依預設會啟用擴充物件。Extension objects are enabled by default. 如果將包含擴充物件的 物件傳遞到 方法，則會加以利用。If an object containing extension objects is passed to the method, they are utilized. - XSLT 樣式表可以包含其他檔案及內嵌指令碼區塊的參考。XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks. 居心不良的使用者會利用這一點，藉由提供您資料或樣式表，使您因執行他們而導致系統持續處理，直到電腦資源不足，來進行攻擊。A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources. - 在混合的信任環境中執行的 XSLT 應用程式，會產生用於詐騙的樣式表。XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing. 例如，居心不良的使用者可載入含有害樣式表的物件，然後將其傳遞給另一使用者，該使用者隨後會呼叫 方法並執行轉換。For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the method and executes the transformation. 不啟用指令碼或 `document()` 函式 (除非樣式表來自信任的來源)，不接受來自不受信任來源的 物件、XSLT 樣式表或 XML 來源資料，可減輕這些安全性問題。These security issues can be mitigated by not enabling scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source, and by not accepting objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from an untrusted source. ## Examples 下列範例會執行轉換，並輸出至檔案。The following example executes a transform and outputs to a file. [!code-csharp[XslCompiledTransform.Transform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Transform/CS/Xslt_Transform_v2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslCompiledTransform.Transform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Transform/VB/Xslt_Transform_v2.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列兩個輸入的檔案：The sample uses the following two input files: `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

threadsafe.span: 換句話說，在後順利完成方法時，可以同時呼叫方法，從多個執行緒。

span.span: In other words, after the method has successfully completed, the method can be called simultaneously from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 如果方法時的一個執行緒中呼叫一次方法呼叫另一個執行緒，物件完成執行呼叫繼續使用舊的狀態。

span.span: If the method is called again in one thread while the method is being called in another thread, the object finishes executing the call by continuing to use the old state.

threadsafe.span: 會使用新的狀態時方法成功完成。

span.span: The new state is used when the method successfully completes.

para.span: 方法不是從多個執行緒同時呼叫時的安全執行緒。

span.span: The method is not thread safe when called simultaneously from multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要逐步執行程式碼和偵錯樣式表，就必須符合下列條件：The following conditions must be met in order to step into the code and debug the style sheet: - `enableDebug` 參數設定為 `true`。The `enableDebug` parameter is set to `true`. - 樣式表傳遞給方法，做為 URI 或實作可實作類別介面。The style sheet is passed to the method either as a URI, or an implementation of the class that implements the interface. 介面的實作上所有的文字剖析物件。The interface is implemented on all text-parsing objects. 換句話說，如果使用來載入樣式表物件，例如或，或有未實作的實作介面，您無法偵錯樣式表。In other words, if the style sheet is loaded using an object, such as an or , or an implementation that does not implement the interface, you cannot debug the style sheet. - 用來載入樣式表是以檔案為基礎，例如(這是預設供類別)。The used to load the style sheet is a file-based , such as the (this is the default used by the class). - 樣式表位於本機電腦上或內部網路上。The style sheet is located on the local machine or on the intranet. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用 XSLT 偵錯。The following example shows how to enable XSLT debugging. remarks.format: ## Remarks `xsltc.exe`工具是一個包裝函式方法。The `xsltc.exe` tool is a wrapper around the method. 編譯樣式表與`xsltc.exe`會符合運用使用已編譯的樣式表的大部分應用程式的需求。Compiling style sheets with the `xsltc.exe` will meet the demands of most applications that leverage the use of compiled style sheets. 建置自訂的編譯工具時，就應該使用方法。The method should be used when building custom compilation tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 類別的整體效能優於 類別，但是在轉換時第一次呼叫 類別的 方法之執行速度可能會比 類別的 方法慢許多。Although the overall performance of the class is better than the class, the method of the class might perform more slowly than the method of the class the first time it is called on a transformation. 這是因為在載入之前必須先編譯 XSLT 檔案。This is because the XSLT file must be compiled before it is loaded. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下列部落格文章：[XslCompiledTransform 比 XslTransform 還慢嗎？](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=130590) (英文)For more information, see the following blog post: [XslCompiledTransform Slower than XslTransform?](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=130590) > [!NOTE] > 在偵錯模式中編譯的 XSLT 與在發行模式中編譯的 XSLT 之間有一些差異。There are differences between XSLT compiled in Debug mode and XSLT compiled in Release mode. 在某些情況下，偵測模式中編譯的樣式表在 期間將不會擲回錯誤，但是稍後會在 期間失敗。In some situations, style sheets compiled in Debug mode will not throw errors during , but will later fail during . 在發行模式中編譯的相同樣式表在 期間將會失敗。The same style sheet compiled in Release mode will fail during . 這類行為範例的情況是在將非節點集型別的變數指派給需要節點集的運算式時。An example of such behavior is when a variable that is not of a node-set type is assigned to an expression where a node-set is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。The class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 樣式表必須使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空間。The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace. 這個方法有下列行為：This method has the following behavior: - 不需要使用者的認證用來解析樣式表 URI，並處理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`項目。An with no user credentials is used to resolve the style sheet URI, and process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements. - 預設設定用來載入樣式表。An with default settings is used to load the style sheet. 在停用 DTD 處理。DTD processing is disabled on the . 如果您需要 DTD 處理，建立透過這項功能已啟用，並將它傳遞給方法。If you require DTD processing, create an with this feature enabled, and pass it to the method. - `document()`函式會停用。The `document()` function is disabled. - 不支援內嵌指令碼。Embedded scripts are not supported. 您可以使用多載來指定使用必要的驗證認證，或指定不同的 XSLT 設定。You can use the overload to specify an with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings. ## Examples 下列範例會執行轉換，並輸出至檔案。The following example executes a transform and outputs to a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks Xsltc.exe 工具用來編譯樣式表，並從樣式表產生組件。The xsltc.exe tool is used to compile style sheets and generate assemblies from the style sheets. 方法會從組件載入已編譯的樣式表。The method loads the compiled style sheet from the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 您也必須在您的應用程式中包含 XSLT 組件，做為參考。You must also include the XSLT assembly as a reference in your application. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從 XSLT 組件載入已編譯的樣式表。The following example shows how to load a compiled style sheet from an XSLT assembly. 此範例假設 xsltc.exe 工具用來建立名為類別，名為 bookOrders bookOrders.dll 組件。The example assumes that the xsltc.exe tool was used to create an assembly named bookOrders.dll with a class named bookOrders. > [!NOTE] > 您不必編譯程式碼時，參考 XSLT 組件。You have to reference the XSLT assembly when compiling the code. 例如，`csc /r:system.dll;system.xml.dll;bookOrders.dll myCode.cs`。For example, `csc /r:system.dll;system.xml.dll;bookOrders.dll myCode.cs`. ```csharp // Load the type of the class. XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform(); xslt.Load(typeof(bookOrders)); ```

XSLT 樣式表必須使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空間。The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace. 從目前節點載入樣式表透過其所有子系。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 這可讓您使用做為樣式表的文件的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 之後方法完成，位於樣式表的結尾之後的下一個節點。After the method completes, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果到達文件結尾，則 會定位於檔案結尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 這個方法有下列行為：This method has the following behavior: - 不需要使用者的認證用來處理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`項目。An with no user credentials is used to process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements. - `document()`函式會停用。The `document()` function is disabled. - 不支援內嵌指令碼。Embedded scripts are not supported. 您可以使用多載來指定使用必要的驗證認證，或指定不同的 XSLT 設定。You can use the overload to specify an with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings. ## Examples 下列範例會載入樣式表中所包含物件。The following example loads a style sheet contained in an object. summary.span: 執行 XSLT 轉換。

span.span: Executes the XSLT transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在偵錯模式中編譯的 XSLT 與在發行模式中編譯的 XSLT 之間有一些差異。There are differences between XSLT compiled in Debug mode and XSLT compiled in Release mode. 在某些情況下，偵測模式中編譯的樣式表在 期間將不會擲回錯誤，但是稍後會在 期間失敗。In some situations, style sheets compiled in Debug mode will not throw errors during , but will later fail during . 在發行模式中編譯的相同樣式表在 期間將會失敗。The same style sheet compiled in Release mode will fail during . 這類行為範例的情況是在將非節點集型別的變數指派給需要節點集的運算式時。An example of such behavior is when a variable that is not of a node-set type is assigned to an expression where a node-set is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XSLT`document()`啟用函式時，就會解析使用使用沒有使用者認證。If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果在需要驗證的網路資源位於外部的資源，請使用採用的多載為其中一個引數，並指定具有必要認證。If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 此方法不支援`xsl:strip-space`項目。This method does not support the `xsl:strip-space` element. 如果您已編譯的樣式表包含`xsl:strip-space`項目，您必須使用多載，這個方法會接受做為輸入引數。If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the overload which takes an as the input argument. 介面是在 及 類別中實作的。The interface is implemented in the and classes. 這些類別代表 XML 資料的記憶體中快取。These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data. - 類別是以 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 為基礎，並包含編輯功能。The class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities. - 類別是以 XPath 資料模型為基礎的唯讀資料存放區。The class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model. 是建議用於 XSLT 處理的類別。 is the recommended class for XSLT processing. 與 類別相比，它可提供更高的效能。It provides faster performance when compared to the class. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立只包含節點片段的物件，並將該物件傳遞至 方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：轉換節點片段](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md). ## Examples 下列範例會執行 XSLT 轉換，並將輸出至物件。The following example executes an XSLT transformation and outputs to an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XSLT`document()`啟用函式時，就會解析使用使用沒有使用者認證。If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果在需要驗證的網路資源位於外部的資源，請使用採用的多載為其中一個引數，並指定具有必要認證。If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 此方法不支援`xsl:strip-space`項目。This method does not support the `xsl:strip-space` element. 如果您已編譯的樣式表包含`xsl:strip-space`項目，您必須使用多載，這個方法會接受做為輸入引數。If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the overload which takes an as the input argument. 介面是在 及 類別中實作的。The interface is implemented in the and classes. 這些類別代表 XML 資料的記憶體中快取。These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data. - 類別是以 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 為基礎，並包含編輯功能。The class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities. - 類別是以 XPath 資料模型為基礎的唯讀資料存放區。The class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model. 是建議用於 XSLT 處理的類別。 is the recommended class for XSLT processing. 與 類別相比，它可提供更高的效能。It provides faster performance when compared to the class. 轉換是指套用到整個文件。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 換言之，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件的根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立只包含節點片段的物件，並將該物件傳遞至 方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：轉換節點片段](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md). ## Examples 下列範例會執行 XSLT 轉換，並將輸出至。The following example executes an XSLT transformation and outputs to a . [!code-csharp[XslCompiledTransform.Transform#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Transform/CS/Xslt_Transform_v2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XslCompiledTransform.Transform#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Transform/VB/Xslt_Transform_v2.vb#6)]
